name: Damned (itch)
description:
Submission for the Kenney Game Jam 2020.

A curse has caused you to turn cannibal. Your only way of life is by taking another's. Talk to your fellow villagers to see who should be spared or sacrificed for your own survival.

Build relationships and make the heavy decision to kill or be killed in Damned.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Interact - E

Look - Mouse Movement

I am always open for suggestions and feedback.  Since this was my first weekend jam, there are bound to be missing features and bugs. Let me know and I can release a post-jam patch, thank you!
